subject: Dr. Louis Turi LIVE Tonight. Come Join In Free!!!
author: bulletbabea
full_text:
Dr. Louis Turi will be on doing a live show tonight on PTN at 10pm EST, 9pm CST, 7PM PST. He will be covering astrologicial questions, tarot reading, and various topics. Feel free to join in and ask him your questions.

http://www.paranormaltvnetwork.com

Its going to be a fun and interesting show!
